metadata.title: CVE-2014-2060 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Winstone servlet container in Jenkins before 1.551 and LTS before1.532.2 allows remote attackers to hijack sessions via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: jenkins-winstone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
